name: Loop (itch) (Disket)
description:
There are 2 endings.

I see people didn't find the rest of the game so I will explain a little more. There are two endings in this game. You can find the other one with the explanation at the end of the first ending. If you didn't see the forth screenshot, then you didn't complete the other side of the game. 

Also there is a bug that causes player to get into only one ending (Will be fixed when the jam is done). If you saw that ending once. You have to restart the application to solve this. Have fun.

-

Another bug causes to last 2 lines are showing bit more late than other lines. Which was the main clue

Here are those:

What would happen if you haven't done anything?

I guess we will never know

A short story about choices.

This game is longer than a minute.

So if you think it is done after a minute: Try not to do what you did first.

But it still has a very short gameplay.

This game is made for 2021 Community Jam with Unity. Controls F - Run boost E- Low radius ability Space - An ability with higher radius
